code: import axios from"axios";export const postFollow=async spaceId=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await axios.post("https://api-mumul.site/follow/".concat(spaceId),{},{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Accept:'application/json',Authorization:'Bearer '+token}});if(response.status!==200){throw new Error('bad server condition');}return response.data;}catch(e){console.error('postFollow Error: ',e.message);}};
